Articles.Content:
Here we go! Something with REAL punch behind it! The Kinkajou is capable of heavy assault as well as personal light defence. Comes equipped with two CONTROLABLE "Rektssile" missiles and two, mini, "Stingray" missiles. Not much else to say on this one, besides put the brakes on when firing. Here you go!

![2KKRa6P.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2KKRa6P.jpg)

![hHnh8gD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hHnh8gD.jpg)

Naturally, a craft file!

[http://www./download/832c3wty03k43eo/Kinkajou+Missile+Launcher.craft](http://www./download/832c3wty03k43eo/Kinkajou+Missile+Launcher.craft)

Hope you like it!![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) And please, leave it a generous +rep!
